definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The slowness is dissolve in hydrofluoric acid and hot oil of vitriols .

sentences.english: Hydrofluoric acid (HF) is an extremely powerful inorganic acid and a vigorous dehydrating agent.
